name: BasketBall King HD
description:
BasketBall King HD is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics.

Discover this top free basketball game with endless ranking, great performance, and amazing features!

The free trow king is in BasketBall King HD.

How to play:
1. Touch the screen
2. drag and drop ball
3. Release to shoot

Features:
-Easy to control, fun for every age players.
-Great shooting experience.
-Simple but special picture style.
-Great sound, visual and haptic touch effects to complement the real basketball feel
-- Completely free, fully featured realistic basketball sports game for every age.

Intuitive controls, realistic physics, make this one of the best basketball games on mobile.
